name: Verification by Abstract Reduction
body:
### Automatic, modular verification of Racket contracts

```
#lang var
(module def racket
   ; ...
   (provide/contract 
      [f (-> integer? integer?)]))

(module use
   (require 'def)
   (f 7))

(require 'use)
```


### Who's responsible for this?
The var tool is by @samth and @dvanhorn.
tagline: Automatic, modular verification of Racket contracts
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
